original_title: LEGO Nexo Knights 4D: The Book of Creativity
overview: A brand new 4D movie experience, exclusive to LEGOLAND. Enter the 4D kingdom of Knighton with Merlok 2.0 and join the heroic NEXO KNIGHTS as they battle it out against the evil Jestro and the Book of Monsters!
title: LEGO Nexo Knights 4D: The Book of Creativity
